Lusbel/Attilla::

Luzbel and aTTilla didn't heard her. They avoided Panzer's shots, 
Attilla shot againt her weapons, hopping weaponless her while Luzbel 
spat his fire, increasing the fire of the fire ring.  


--- In nbwrpg@y..., logomorph@h... wrote:
> Panzer::
> She suddenly felt intence heat all around her. She stopped and 
> turned, trying to find away out. Not finding one, she transformed 
> back into bot mode and drew her sidearm. She had to use her acute  
> audio sensors in order to guide herself as far as where her targets 
> were. She aimed as carfully as she could. "Get Back! I don't want 
to 
> hurt you. But I will shoot. Back Away! Now!" She figured out where 
> the two preds were coming from, now if she could only get lucky and 
> hit one. She steadied her hand, and fired. 
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@y..., airly2000@y... wrote:
> > Luzbel/Attilla::
> > 
> > Luzbel spat fire  and made a ring of fire around Panzer. "We got 
> you 
> > kitty!!!!" shouted the male while his brother laughted evily
> > 
> >
